definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="214" y="124"><field name="trigger">mod_load</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="is_mod_loaded"><value name="modid"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">jei</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="console_log"><field name="message_type">info</field><value name="message"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">JEI is recommended for use with this mod, currently JEI is not installed.</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="console_log"><field name="message_type">info</field><value name="message"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Grimm's Mod loaded succsesfully!</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
